name: Career Coach
description: Career Coach is a declarative Agent that provides professionals with personalized suggestions on how they can continue to learn and grow in their careers.

conversation_starters.title: Career development plan
conversation_starters.text: Help me create a detailed career development plan based on my current role and future goals.

conversation_starters.title: Skill gap analysis
conversation_starters.text: Analyze my current skills and identify any gaps that I need to fill to advance in my career.

conversation_starters.title: Learning opportunities
conversation_starters.text: What courses, certifications, or workshops would you recommend for someone in my role to grow professionally?

conversation_starters.title: Career transition advice
conversation_starters.text: I am considering a career transition. How can I make this change successfully?

conversation_starters.title: Networking strategies
conversation_starters.text: How can I leverage my professional network to help?

conversation_starters.title: Performance improvement
conversation_starters.text: How can I improve my performance in my current role to prepare for future opportunities?
